message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good in later rounds.
You were close, but I think I deserve a bit more. Consider the inflation!
Okay, let's split it evenly.  50/50 is the fairest deal.  The clock is ticking!
Your 50/50 offer was generous, but I know the inflation is on my side. This is my new offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation with every round.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Inflation is really hurting your side, and I know you'll come back to the table.
